name: BattleParkour - Beta
description:
Hello guys!

I am pretty new to game dev (only 1-2 months since i've started on game dev) and so I am working on a game (Unity Engine) called BattleParkour. I've released the beta version 4 of the game but I will release previous versions also!

If you have found any bugs or glitches please comment down below.

The full version is still yet to come.
